channel.title: Pics in Interface
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I would like to know if it is possible to add pictures in a interface like runescape skill menus and how?
All help is appreciated
Thanx! :)

item.title: Pics in Interface

item.description:
@Chemical_Reaction wrote:

Chemical Reaction:

You need a client that has the picture in the folder and the location of it

You dont read much either do ya? Got msn or anything i know how to get the pics on there

item.title: Pics in Interface
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

public void attackmenu(int a) {
	client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];
	p.sendQuest("@whi@A@gre@t@whi@t@gre@a@whi@c@gre@k", 8716);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@L@gre@e@whi@v@gre@e@whi@l", 8718);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@A@gre@d@whi@v@gre@a@whi@n@gre@c@whi@e@gre@m@whi@e@gre@n@whi@t", 8719);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@1", 8720);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@1", 8721);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@5", 8722);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@10", 8723);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@20", 8724);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@30", 8725);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@40", 8726);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@60", 8727);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@70", 8728);
	p.sendQuest("", 8729);
	p.sendQuest(" ", 8730);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@B@gre@o@whi@n@gre@z@whi@e", 8760);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@I@gre@r@whi@o@gre@n", 8761);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@S@gre@t@whi@e@gre@e@whi@l", 8762);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@B@gre@l@whi@a@gre@c@whi@k", 8763);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@M@gre@i@whi@t@gre@h@whi@r@gre@i@whi@l", 8764);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@A@gre@d@whi@a@gre@m@whi@e@gre@n@whi@t@gre@i@whi@t@gre@e", 8765);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@R@gre@u@whi@n@gre@e", 8766);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@D@gre@r@whi@a@gre@g@whi@o@gre@n", 8767);
	p.sendQuest("@whi@E@gre@l@whi@f C@gre@r@whi@y@gre@s@whi@t@gre@a@whi@l", 8768);
	p.sendQuest("", 8769);
	p.sendQuest(" ", 8770);
	p.sendQuest("Attack", 8846);
	p.sendQuest("", 8849);
	p.sendQuest("Defense", 8823);
	p.sendQuest("Strength", 8824);
	p.sendQuest("", 8827);
	p.sendQuest("", 8837);
	p.sendQuest("", 8840);
	p.sendQuest("", 8843);
	p.sendQuest(" ", 8859);
	p.sendQuest(" ", 8862);
	p.sendQuest(" ", 8865);
	p.sendQuest(" ", 15303);
	p.sendQuest(" ", 15306);
	p.sendQuest(" ", 15309);
	p.clearQuestInterface();
	p.sendFrame246(8715, 700, 3777);
	p.showInterface(8714);
	p.flushOutStream();
}

im not sure if that was what you were asking, but that will show the old runescape skill menu, but the paper part on the back is replaced by whatever item you want (replace the 3777 at the bottom with the item id)

Read full topic
